title: Bachelorette's Carlin Sterritt worked as a sales assistant at Cotton On before finding fame
text:
It has just been revealed that he has an acting profile on IMDb and 'auditions for leading roles around the world.'

And it seems that for Bachelorette star Carlin Sterritt, 30, before finding fame on the reality TV show, he had very humble beginnings in retail.

The fan favourite did a stint as a sales assistant at clothing chain Cotton On, and can been posing with friends and colleagues outside a Sydney store back in 2017.

From retail to reality TV! The Bachelorette's Carlin Sterritt (second L, back row) worked as a sales assistant at Cotton On before finding fame... after it was revealed he has an acting profile on IMDb and 'auditions for leading roles'

In the snap, Carlin flashes the peace sign and can be seen with a lanyard around his neck.

He appears in high spirits as he poses with his colleagues and looks casual, in a dark T-shirt and shorts.

It comes after it was revealed that the Bachelorette front runner and part-time model has an IMDb profile that describes him as an 'Australian actor auditioning for leading roles around the world'.

Interesting! It comes after it was revealed that the Bachelorette front runner and part-time model has an IMDb profile that describes him as an 'Australian actor auditioning for leading roles around the world'

He has also shot campaigns for Australian brands and currently stars on a TV commercial for Wollongong suit shop, Tramps the Store.

Carlin's IMDb profile lists his most recent acting role as the lead in Australian feature film Out of the Woods, which is in post-production.

The hunk stars as Will Denovan, a successful real estate broker who wakes up to find himself in the woods, with no idea as to how he got there.

Carlin has also appeared in several short films including 2017's Divided, 2013's Graveyard Shift and Red Zone, also released that year.

Chasing that dream: He has also shot campaigns for Australian brands and currently stars on a TV commercial for Wollongong suit shop, Tramps the Store

However it was a guest role in NBC's pilot season of CAMP in 2013, where his career began to kick off.

Carlin made his co-stars envious on Thursday night's episode of The Bachelorette when he had a full 24 hours with Angie, 29.

During the date, Carlin left Angie speechless as he confessed his divorce hadn't yet been finalised.

Bombshell! Carlin made his co-stars envious on Thursday night's episode of The Bachelorette when he had a full 24 hours with Angie, 29. During the date, Carlin left Angie speechless as he confessed his divorce hadn't yet been finalised

'I am the type of guy who wants to be open and transparent, because, you know, there's no other way to do it. I am... married,' he stammered.

His revelation prompted a shell-shocked Angie to laugh nervously in response.

'In 2016, I, um... I got married. We've been apart for a year-and-a-half,' Carlin continued, claiming he and his wife, Taran Higgins, simply 'drifted apart'.

'I was pretty hurt in the process, and she's moved overseas now. So, like, for me that was sort of like, you know, I was, like, I've closed that chapter of my life.'
description: It has just been revealed that he has an acting profile on IMDb and 'auditions for leading roles around the world.'
authors: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
